title: Add /api/context/:epicId endpoint
description:
Add API endpoint to serve context documents from .tick/logs/context/<epic-id>.md

Implementation:
- Add GET /api/context/:epicId handler in internal/board/server.go
- Read file from .tick/logs/context/<epic-id>.md
- Return raw markdown content with Content-Type: text/markdown
- Return 404 if file doesn't exist

Test cases:
- Existing context file -> 200 with markdown content
- Missing context file -> 404
- Invalid epic ID -> 404

Run: go test ./internal/board/... -v -run Context
acceptance_criteria: API tests pass, endpoint returns context markdown
closed_reason: Added GET /api/context/:epicId endpoint to server.go. Reads markdown files from .tick/logs/context/<epicId>.md and returns with Content-Type: text/markdown. Returns 404 for missing files. Added 4 test cases covering existing file, missing file, invalid epic ID, and method not allowed.
